title: 服务器核电爆炸
author: 丨任心荒芜灬
txt_content: 谁知道怎么修改配置 改he'dian

replies.author: nice丿猫
replies.txt_content:
找到工业的配置文件IC2.ini
找到
[protection]
; Enable logging of players when they remove a machine using a wrench.
wrenchLogging = true
; Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.
nukeExplosionPowerLimit = 60
; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 45
; Enable the nuke
enableNuke = true

数值60和45 分别是核弹和核反应堆的威力 调零就好了，后面那个Enable the nuke  enableNuke = true是允许使用核武器
